Action.author: jdipiazz
Action.body: This should be part of the NODE SDK project not the Blockchain Explorer project?

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: The Channel queryByChaincode() method is really just a convenience method that wraps the sendTransactionProposal(). So if the full response object is required and the proposal object then just use the sendTransactionProposal() method.
